column5: About time someone volunteered to clean up all them dam cups !
I've got about 50,000 petropoints and last year used up about 100,000. Fill up twice and get a free lottery ticket
wow....i usually get skunked most years....maybe this year'll be different because i've upped my coffee intake to about 3-4 cups a day
Got a promotion did you?

Just for your info, a part time medical records clerk picked a Timmy's at the outlet on the lower level of our hospital of Wednesday and "Bingo" a new Toyota. Also when I read the Timmins Daily Press website yesterday, apparently someone up there also picked up a Toyata. That's 2 gone. I'll win when the Leafs win the Stanley Cup. That means probably not in my lifetime!

My friend just rolled-up-the-rim on a Bayliner bowrider boat, motor, and trailer  Problem is he has already decided to sell it and put new windows in his house  And I thought I was going to get to burn around in a new boat this summer.....  Burt
sell the house ,,, move in the boat , problem solved.  lol .
I keep trying that one with my wife...so far no luck...  Congrats to your friend though!  I'm hoping for at least one free coffee this year, it would be more than what I won last year.
these guys didn't win
Isnt that the same cup that they get every year!!!

I once won a Raleigh Mountain Bike... first ride out got hurt real bad  ... a  TV.... and then a BBQ...all that in 4 yrs  countless coffees and goodies.  I once even Almost won a Motorhome   it said   you    " WINABAGEL"  I'd sell or trade in the boat on a fishin' model...  Congrats to your Buddy....  Why don't you buy the boat?   Randy

What happen with the (winner or winners) from last year about the car? This was the story of the kid who pick it out of the trash from the school. Remember something about DNA test?  Nice to hear your friend won the boat Burtess.
Thats great...  lol.. I won a donut!!
Two years ago I won a Coleman camping set....go figure owning an outdoor store and I can get those products whenever I want them.........would have rather had a flat screen  Regards, Sam
HOLY CRAP. i just threw out my winning cup... i think i should go back into the garbage and pick it back out and roll up that rim... hahha
so.. looks like there are 99 of them left...
No $$$  They say the odds are 1 in 9.....  I kept track last time and my odds were like 1 in 15   ...  Burt
I never win a damn thing!
BAHAHAHAHA!!!!! That's Awesome! I definitely burst out laughing on that one! good stuff! hahaha
Congratulations!  Now to the important part of your post...Did I hear you say new windows??
Nope, I heard they got a few winners before.    about 41 years ago.    I wonder if I'll ever live to see the leafs win a cup. I'm 30 years old and I expect to live till 84.  I doubt it.
Well I am doing pretty good this year.  I am at 8 out of 10 since Monday.  But just coffees and donuts so far.

i buy 3 lg every morning 5 days a week and on week ends i buy 3 lg and 2 extra lg for my lovely wife  ,never won anything big but when this event ended last year i had 78 free coffees,65 donuts and 43 muffins,the last 2 years i phone ahead and order it all at once then i bring it to a senior bld and set it up so they can enjoy a mid day coffee and what not. this is the same building i give alot of cleaned and deboned  fish too. funny thing is ive gained 15lbs doing this cause the ladies won't let ya go untill you have a cookie or cake or pc of home made pie,i tell them i do it for me but the home made goodies are winning me over lol.lol.  i plan on winning big this year lol,like that will happen.  congrads to you bud im happy for him...  Hawg Hunter
Add me to that list...  I always buy XL's...  Perhaps I should start buying L's...
Buy two smalls instead of an extra large.
Lucky guy! This is all I keep getting

I find the freebees in the 'RRRRRRROLL UP THE RRRRRRRIM' contest to be equivalent to about the same amount of prizes as my PETROPOINTS card has gotten me .  .  .   .      in over 20 years I've got 1000 lousy Petro points ONCE . . . . .     a carwash costs about 7000!!

Last time there was roll up to win, I didnt open any of the cups until they were done giving them out.  I had 80 cups and out of those 80 I had 7 winning cups, 4 doghnuts and 3 coffe!  Somone told me that xl cups dont have many winners, I guess they were right.  My cousin buys large and wins all the time!  This is unfare, I spend more money for less of a chance!  Oh well as long as I get my order made right, thats a win right there since it seems to be the same odds!
You're a genius!  I'm going out right now!

On the subject, I just found this off redflagdeals.com ******** Here's a clever little freebie from Country Style, the Ontario coffee chain: March 3-9, bring in a losing Tim Horton's Roll Up The Rim cup and get a free medium coffee.  Now, finally, every cup of Tim Horton's will be a Roll Up The Rim Winner -- whether it's a winner at Tim Horton's or the Coffee Style down the street. ******** MORE COFFEE!
